author: jeastman
msg: Created a new SparseNormalModelDistribution to begin attacking the text clustering domain. First implementation is based upon NormalModel and NormalModelDistribution but adds a filtering step to sampleFromPosterior to set insignificant mean elements to 0.0 to conserve space.
Adjusted NormalModel.toString to be more SparseVector-friendly and introduced TestSparseModelClustering tests

author: gbrown
msg: Add a selectedIndex property to SuggestionPopup; add a SuggestionPopupCloseHandler interface.

author: elecharny
msg: o Removed the entryUUID from each entry
o Added a version: 1 on top of each entry to avoid a warning

author: sebb
msg: BeanInfoSupport now caches getBeanDescriptor() - should avoid an NPE on non-Sun JVMs when using CSVDataSet (and some other TestBeans)
